reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Medium thickness, great warm up top, true to size
reviews.reviewText: I love the fabric for this item. It is not fleece lined like a sweatshirt, but it is more of a terry cloth material with medium thickness, but it is very breathable. The fabric washed and dries very well. I did hang to dry as I really liked the fit and did not want it to shrink. I ordered a small and I like the way it fits. It is a little baggy as designed, but very true to size. Long sleeves! It seems like the type of fabric that won't pill. I like that the length is a little shorter and the 1/4 zip is nice for taking it on and off easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s ok for price
reviews.reviewText: The color is nice for fall, but it’s not what I was hoping for feel wise. For the price it’s just ok.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love this pullover! Especially the price point!!!! The only issue I had with it was that the thumb holes are super tiny. I won’t be using it with my thumbs inside anyway, so it doesn’t bother me that much. Still well worth the cost!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quarter Zip Gray Hoodie
reviews.reviewText: This pullover hoodie is nice and thick. It has a short zipper in the front that gives a little extra room to pull it on and take it of, sort of a collar with the hoodie for wind block, and a large pocket that goes all the way across so your hands can meet in the middle. The fleece material is warm, very soft, a little bit stretchy, and pretty much the same as any comfy hoodie. The design is very sleek looking. I have this in the light gray color which is a very soft gray. It did not bleed colors, shrink, or wrinkle after washing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Uncomfortable thumb holes
reviews.reviewText: One of my favorite things about a comfortable hoodie is the inclusion of longer sleeves with thumb holes but unfortunately this hoodie failed on both aspects. While the sleeves on this hoodie might be an acceptable length (I would still prefer them longer though) the thumb holes were definitely too small and not placed in the right spot which made them uncomfortable to use. Besides the unfortunate thumb hole situation the fabric itself is not very soft and the hoodie has an odd cut in the back. The zipper also seems very cheap and is rough to the touch. While I do like the color (I got the pink one) and the large size of the hood the other aspects make this a definite no for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars OK lightweight sweatshirt
reviews.reviewText: The photos make it look like this sweatshirt is more of a neoprene type material, but it's not. It's more like a thick t-shirt. I have quite a few sweatshirts in this general style and this is not my favorite of them. The sleeves are on the shorter side for me (I'm 5'10") and the thumb holes are tight on my thumbs. Overall it's fine, but it won't be the one I reach for first.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love everything about this hoodie
reviews.reviewText: I am very picky about clothes and this hoodie fits all my expectations: the color is lovely, so gentle and soft; the fabric is very soft and lightweight; the style is perfect, it's loose enough to wear something underneath, and at the same time it shows body shape; the hood is deep so even you have large amount of hair it fits great. Oh, and the pocket is kangaroo-type.I am 5'4 and 128lb. The size I ordered and the one in the photos is S.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for workout
reviews.reviewText: I love the color, the thumb holes, and the kangaroo pocket on the front of this zip-up sweatshirt. The zipper glides smoothly, and the sweatshirt has just the right weight—neither too heavy nor too lightweight. It's the ideal thickness for workouts on cooler days. I followed the size chart and ordered my usual size, and it fits perfectly as expected.
